name: About color
info:
Color criteria is there to represent 
Red for security breach, Motion detection and High power usage
Orange is for moderate energy usage

Green is for NO security breaches, no motion detection and small energy usage.

#it seems that color is not chaning in raspberry-pi node red

label: button
tooltip: Send the report to above email

func:
msg.payload = "Annex 1 Smoke level(ppm):- " +  global.get("smk1") + "
" + "Annex 2 Smoke level(ppm):- " + global.get("smk2") +"
" + "Annex 1 Security Issues :- " + global.get("sec1") +"
" + "Annex 2 Security issues :- " + global.get("sec2") +"
" + "Annex 1 Temperature :- " + global.get("temp1") +" C" +"
" + "Annex 2 Temparature :- " + global.get("temp2") +" C" +"
" + "LPG gas leakage(ppm) :- " + global.get("gas") +"
" + "Last reported energy compsumpltion (J)  :- " + global.get("cpow") +"
" + "Total Energy consumption :- " + global.get("tpow") +"
" + "Humidity Level (%) :- " + global.get("hym") +"%" +"
" + "Motion detecting status :- " + global.get("mtn") +"
";
msg.topic="The Last Total Summery";

return msg;

name: Special Note
info:
Outlook gives errors when sending large number of emails within a period of time.
